examples.example: 新时代的大学生们充满朝气与活力，积极投身各项实践活动，展现出青春的风采。

translate.english: College students in the new era are full of vigor and vitality, actively participate in various practical activities, and show the demeanor of youth.

examples.example: 积极向上的大学生们努力奋斗，为实现自己的梦想不断拼搏。

translate.english: Positive college students strive hard and continuously fight to realize their dreams.

examples.example: 优秀的大学生们在知识的海洋中畅游，不断提升自我。

translate.english: Excellent college students swim freely in the ocean of knowledge and continuously improve themselves.
